channel.title: Clemens Siebler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Clemens Siebler's Blog

item.title: Getting started with Azure OpenAI Studio
item.description: Introduction video # This video post is a short introduction to Azure OpenAI Service and its browser-based Studio capability:

item.title: Using Azure Active Directory (AAD) to authenticate with Azure OpenAI Service
item.description: Introduction # This post explains how you can authenticate to Azure OpenAI Service by using Azure Active Directory.

item.title: Using Azure OpenAI Service for processing claim calls
item.description: Introduction # In this post, we’ll quickly look into how we can use Azure OpenAI Service to automatically process claim calls.

item.title: Azure Active Directory (AAD) authentication for Azure Cognitive Services
item.description: Introduction # In this post we’ll show how you can use Azure Active Directory to authenticate against Azure Cognitive Services.

item.title: Using Cognitive Services Read API with data secured by VNET
item.description: Introduction # This post discusses how Cognitive Services can be used to process data that is securely stored behind a VNET.

item.title: Using Azure Read API for processing many documents at scale
item.description: Introduction # The Azure Read API allows you to perform OCR on scanned documents of all kinds.

item.title: Analyzing Call Center Transcripts with Azure Cognitive Search and PowerBI
item.description: Introduction # This post explains how we can search and analyze call center transcripts using Azure Cognitive Search and PowerBI.

item.title: Azure Cognitive Services Containers processing time comparison
item.description: Introduction # Azure offers a rich set of pre-trained AI models called Cognitive Services which can help you solving a large variety of tasks.

item.title: Invoking Azure Machine Learning Pipelines from Azure Data Factory using DataPath
item.description: Introduction # This is a quick post for showing how to call Azure Machine Learning Pipelines from Azure Data Factory.

item.title: Enforcing Init Scripts on Azure Machine Learning Compute Instances
item.description: Introduction # This post is a quick tip, showing how you can automatically enforce an Init Script during Azure Machine Learning Compute Instance provisioning.

item.title: Deploying Azure Machine Learning Models to Azure App Service
item.description: Introduction # This post will explain deploying Azure Machine Learning models to Azure App Service.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning Custom Images (for Advanced Scenarios)
item.description: Introduction # This posts shows how to use custom images in Azure Machine Learning for model training.

item.title: Mounting Datasets to a Compute Instance in Azure Machine Learning
item.description: Introduction # This post outlines how you can mount a Dataset to a Compute Instance in Azure Machine.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Clemens – I studied Computer Science at the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, Germany and spend a year researching at Carnegie Mellon University in Pittsburgh, PA, USA.

item.title: Talks
item.description: Speaking in front of small and large audiences has been my passion for many years – if you want to see me on stage, check out my upcoming talks.
